title: Child and adult shot in Altadena, sheriff's department says
content:
ALTADENA, Calif. (KABC) --
A child and adult were shot in Altadena late Tuesday evening, according to the Los Angeles Sheriff's Department.
Deputies said they responded to an assault with a deadly weapon call at Olive Avenue and Figueroa Drive.
The sheriff's department said a child and adult were both taken to the hospital.
Their conditions were not immediately available.
